revised_title: Milk Production in Elderly Women: A Case Study
tldr: This article shares two case studies of elderly women, one in Germany and the other in the author's family, who were able to produce milk for their grandchildren after experiencing strong emotional desires to nurse them. The author suggests that a mother's or nurse's strong imagination and passion to give suck can cause chyle to be released as milk. This phenomenon was surprising and wondred at by those who witnessed it.
